mapper.select:
select ordernum, od.productnum productnum, productname, mc.mcatenum mcatenum, orderquantity, to_char(orderconfirm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orderconfirm, orderprice, mc.mcatename mcatename from(select ordernum, a.productnum, productname, b.mcatenum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, userid, orderstatus from(select ordernum, productnum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, orderstatus from orderdetail) a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum ) od join mcategory mc on od.mcatenum = mc.mcatenum where orderstatus='구매확정'
and od.productnum in
${item}
and orderconfirm between #{startCalendarDataValue} and #{endCalendarDataValue} order by orderconfirm asc, ordernum asc

select count(productnum) from (select ordernum, a.productnum, productname, b.mcatenum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, userid, orderstatus from (select ordernum, productnum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, orderstatus from orderdetail) a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum ) od join mcategory mc on od.mcatenum = mc.mcatenum where orderstatus='구매확정' and orderconfirm between add_months(last_day(sysdate)+1,-3) and add_months(last_day(sysdate),0)

select sum(orderprice*orderquantity) payData,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1),'yyyy-mm') monthData
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2),'yyyy-mm') monthData
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3),'yyyy-mm') monthData
from (select ordernum, a.productnum, productname, b.mcatenum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, userid, orderstatus from (select ordernum, productnum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice, orderstatus from orderdetail) a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum ) od join mcategory mc on od.mcatenum = mc.mcatenum where orderstatus='구매확정' and orderconfirm between
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 0), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), -2), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by productnum
